name: 刷闪
刷閃
Bench Macro [Shiny Hunt]
desc:
背对长椅使用
推荐按键L+R+A
持续按住快捷键0.5秒开启循环

背對長椅使用
推薦按鍵 L+R+A
持續按住快捷鍵 0.5 秒開啟循環
Position yourself with your back to the bench you've chosen to sit on, as if you were just killing time. Press L+R+A to activate the macro, holding these buttons for one second to start the loop.
macros.author: FuuDigo
